items.name: CDR
items.description: ADC common regular data register for dual and triple modes

items.name: CDR2
items.description: ADC x common regular data register for 32-bit dual mode

fields.name: DUAL
fields.description: Dual ADC mode selection

fields.name: DELAY
fields.description: Delay between 2 sampling phases

fields.name: DAMDF
fields.description: Dual ADC Mode Data Format

fields.name: CKMODE
fields.description: ADC clock mode

fields.name: PRESC
fields.description: ADC prescaler

fields.name: VREFEN
fields.description: VREFINT enable

fields.name: VSENSEEN
fields.description: Temperature sensor enable

fields.name: VBATEN
fields.description: VBAT enable

fieldset/CDR.description: ADC common regular data register for dual and triple modes

fields.name: RDATA_MST
fields.description: Regular data of the master ADC

fields.name: RDATA_SLV
fields.description: Regular data of the slave ADC

fieldset/CDR2.description: ADC x common regular data register for 32-bit dual mode

fields.name: RDATA_ALT
fields.description: Regular data of the master/slave alternated ADCs

fields.name: ADRDY_MST
fields.description: Master ADC ready

fields.name: EOSMP_MST
fields.description: End of Sampling phase flag of the master ADC

fields.name: EOC_MST
fields.description: End of regular conversion of the master ADC

fields.name: EOS_MST
fields.description: End of regular sequence flag of the master ADC

fields.name: OVR_MST
fields.description: Overrun flag of the master ADC

fields.name: JEOC_MST
fields.description: End of injected conversion flag of the master ADC

fields.name: JEOS_MST
fields.description: End of injected sequence flag of the master ADC

fields.name: JQOVF_MST
fields.description: Injected Context Queue Overflow flag of the master ADC

fields.name: ADRDY_SLV
fields.description: Slave ADC ready

fields.name: EOSMP_SLV
fields.description: End of Sampling phase flag of the slave ADC

fields.name: EOC_SLV
fields.description: End of regular conversion of the slave ADC

fields.name: EOS_SLV
fields.description: End of regular sequence flag of the slave ADC

fields.name: OVR_SLV
fields.description: Overrun flag of the slave ADC

fields.name: JEOC_SLV
fields.description: End of injected conversion flag of the slave ADC

fields.name: JEOS_SLV
fields.description: End of injected sequence flag of the slave ADC

fields.name: JQOVF_SLV
fields.description: Injected Context Queue Overflow flag of the slave ADC

fields.name: AWD_MST
fields.description: Analog watchdog flag of the master ADC

fields.name: AWD_SLV
fields.description: Analog watchdog flag of the slave ADC

variants.name: Asynchronous
variants.description: Use Kernel Clock adc_ker_ck_input divided by PRESC. Asynchronous to AHB clock

variants.name: SyncDiv1
variants.description: Use AHB clock rcc_hclk3. In this case rcc_hclk must equal sys_d1cpre_ck

variants.name: SyncDiv2
variants.description: Use AHB clock rcc_hclk3 divided by 2

variants.name: SyncDiv4
variants.description: Use AHB clock rcc_hclk3 divided by 4

variants.name: NoPack
variants.description: Without data packing, CDR/CDR2 not used

variants.name: Format32to10
variants.description: CDR formatted for 32-bit down to 10-bit resolution

variants.name: DualRJ
variants.description: Dual, combined regular simultaneous + injected simultaneous mode

variants.name: DualRA
variants.description: Dual, combined regular simultaneous + alternate trigger mode

variants.name: DualIJ
variants.description: Dual, combined interleaved mode + injected simultaneous mode
